6.60: Witchcraft no longer grants 3%/6%/9%/12% movement speed bonus.
6.41: Silence Fixed radius to be 200/275/350/350, instead of 300, when  Witchcraft is at level 0. Reduced manacost from 90 to 80. Reduced  Witchcraft Silence manacost reduction from 10/20/30/40 to 0/10/20/30.
6.65: Witchcraft now grants 3%/6%/9%/12% movement speed again.
6.68: Reduced  Crypt Swarm cooldown from 9 to 8 (Witchcraft still reduces by 1/2/3/4).
6.35: Fixed  Witchcraft not reducing Silence cooldown by 1/2/3/4.
6.39: Fixed level 4  Witchcraft reducing level 4  Crypt Swarm manacost by 15, instead of 20.
6.72d: Increased base armor from -1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.96).
6.55: Increased base  strength from 17 to 19.  Exorcism Increased spirits' travel speed from unknown to 500. Increased healing cap from unknown to 1000.
6.79: Increased  Exorcism spirits damage from 43-48 to 53-58.
6.78: Reduced movement speed from 285 to 280. Increased  Silence radius from 200/275/350/350 to 350 on each level. Increased  Witchcraft movement speed bonus from 4%/8%/12%/16% to 5%/10%/15%/20%.
6.51: Fixed  Witchcraft increasing Exorcism cooldown to 120.
6.50: Increased  Witchcraft movement speed bonus from 2%/4%/6%/8% to 3%/6%/9%/12%.  Exorcism Reduced healing cap from unknown to unknown. Reduced cooldown from 120 to 100.
6.75: Increased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 2.96).
6.76: Increased  Exorcism number of spirits from 4/10/18 to 4/12/21.
6.70: Increased base attack damage from 19-31 to 24-36 (total attack damage is now 44-56). Increased  strength gain from 1.8 to 2.2.  Exorcism no longer has a 1000 healing cap.
6.73: Increased  Witchcraft movement speed bonus from 3%/6%/9%/12% to 4%/8%/12%/16%.
6.72: Increased base health regeneration from 0.25 to 0.75.  Witchcraft Increased Crypt Swarm manacost reduction from 5/10/15/20 to 10/15/20/25. Rescaled Silence manacost reduction from 0/10/20/30 to 10/15/20/25. Rescaled Exorcism ghost count increase from 1/2/3/4 for lvl 1, 1/3/4/6 for lvl 2 and 0/2/4/7 for lvl 3 to 3/4/5/6 for all 3 levels. Rescaled  Exorcism number of spirits from 5/10/16 to 4/10/18.
6.82c: Reduced  Crypt Swarm damage from 100/175/250/300 to 75/150/225/300. Increased  Exorcism cooldown from 135 to 145.
6.80: Increased  Exorcism cooldown from 100 to 115. Increased  Silence radius from 350 to 425.
6.84: Increased  Exorcism number of ghosts from 4/12/21 to 6/13/21.
6.48b: Reduced  Silence non-hero duration from 16/20/24/28 to 3/4/5/6.
